data.title: STRATTEC Security Corporation: Careers
data.meta_description: Your automotive career at Strattec starts with jobs in our hometown Milwaukee and in Michigan and Mexico. To find out more about current employment opportunities in our organization, please find our job openings here.
data.text:
Why Choose STRATTEC

“Transforming The Automotive Industry & Beyond Through Innovation.”

Travel

Have you ever wanted the opportunity to travel the world and experience new cultures? As a global company, we offer the chance to travel to visit and work at our facilities around the globe.

Depending on your role at STRATTEC, you may have the opportunity to travel to our various locations across the country and across the globe. These opportunities may vary from a few days to longer stays (if you’re interested) to learn new products or lend your expertise.

The most common travel is to STRATTEC locations in Detroit, Milwaukee and Mexico, but there are often opportunities to travel to locations in Europe, China, and India for certain positions. And even if you can’t travel, you will most likely have the opportunity to interact with employees from those locations via the phone or video conference!

STRATTEC has been recognized by Automotive News as an innovation leader, winning the 2018 and 2019 PACE Award.

Our leading-edge products and technologies are used by the automotive industry’s most successful manufacturers, including General Motors, Ford Motor Company and Fiat Chrysler.
